snippet.title: Save the Cat! Goes to the Movies: The Screenwriter's Guide ...
snippet.description: In the long-awaited sequel to his surprise bestseller, "Save the Cat!," author and screenwriter Snyder returns to form in a fast-paced follow-up that proves why his is the most talked-about approach to screenwriting in years.

snippet.title: Save the Cat!: The Last Book on Screenwriting You'll Ever Need
snippet.description: This ultimate insider's guide reveals the secrets that none dare admit, told by a show biz veteran who's proven that you can sell your script if you can save the cat!

snippet.title: Samurai Cat Goes to the Movies
snippet.description: Chronicles the fifth adventure of Miawoara Tomokato and his nephew Shiro as they take on parodies of such American film characters as the Terminator, the Wizard of Oz, Captain Kirk, Mr. Spock, and Hannbal Lector.

snippet.title: The cinematic cat: a cat's guide to the great movies
The Cat in the Hat Movie Storybook
snippet.description: The kids slumped in their chairs Too glum to complain.
